text: Ra juna byaktilē tinīharūbāṭa yasa avasaramā piṭhyu pharkā'unēcha,– tara yadi usalē yud'dhacālakō rūpamā vā arkō ṭukaḍīsam̐ga śaraṇa lina ā'um̐cha– tyō arkai kurā hō. Bām̐kī aru jasalē yastō garnēcha, tyō allāhakō krōdhamā parnēcha. Ra tyasakō bāsasthāna narka hunēcha ra tyō sāhrai narāmrō ṭhā'um̐ hō
